snippet: George Soros, who closed his hedge fund to outside money last year, is spending some of his billions to aid Democrats' electoral chances this fall through an increased grass-roots organizing effort.
abstract: George Soros, who closed his hedge fund to outside money last year, is spending some of his billions to aid Democrats' electoral chances this fall through an increased grass-roots organizing effort.

headline.main: Soros to Give $2 Million to Liberal Groups
